The [S]treet.desc:
You stand in front of Hotel Pyramide, an Egyptian styled
boutique hotel. There is a Hacker Conference going on at the hotel.
The [S]treet.action_str1: Hahaha, you are trying to talk to a hotel!
The [S]treet.open_acl_msg: No no no, you can't leave this hotel. You are locked in forever.

The [H]otel Lobby.desc: You are in the lobby of our beautiful hotel "The Pyramid". Here you can find our reception, the hotel bar and a shop. On your right you can find the elevator to all the rooms and on the left is of course the entrance through which you came in.

The [E]levator.desc: The elevator will take you to any floor you like
The [E]levator.action_acl_msg: You don't have a VIP keycard, access denied
The [E]levator.state_desc: VIP access to second floor granted.
The [E]levator.action_msg: VIP access to second floor granted.

The [F]irst Floor.desc: This the hallway on the First Floor
The [F]irst Floor.open_acl_msg: Access to this floor is for hotel guests only!

The [S]econd Floor.desc: This is the hallway on the Second Floor
The [S]econd Floor.open_acl_msg: This floor is for VIP guests only!

[K]eycard.desc: This looks like a VIP keycard
[K]eycard.action_msg: You succesfully copied the VIP keycard

Keycard-[C]opy.desc: A copy of the VIP keycard

[P]roxmark III.desc: The Proxmark is an RFID swiss-army tool, allowing for both high and low level interactions with the vast majority of RFID tags and systems world-wide.
[P]roxmark III.action_acl_msg: You need some money to buy the Proxmark III

[R]obe.desc: A nice soft bathrobe of ancient egyptian cotton.

[I]ncense.desc: The kind of incense used for rituals.

The [R]eceptionist.action_acl_msg: I'm sorry sir, I'm only allowed to check out VIP guests.
The [R]eceptionist.action_str1: Here you go Sir, everything is settled.
The [R]eceptionist.state_desc: You are now allowed to leave the hotel

[A]TM machine.desc: Hey, the ATM is hacked and gives out free $100 bills
[A]TM machine.action_msg: You have withdrawn $100 and put it in your wallet
[A]TM machine.action_acl_msg: Please play fair and don't use the ATM so often!

The [D]ungeon.desc: Your light is blinding me so I can't see much, please get into a dark area so my eyes can adjust.

[G]uard.desc: There is a guard near the tunnel
[G]uard.action_acl_msg:
Access to the tunnel can only be granted to a group
of 4 people, each bringing one of the 4 elements.
[G]uard.action_msg:
Make sure your offering is perfect, otherwise the High Priest will
not trust you and rejects access to the secret Pyramid.

Here are your personal hints:

* Khonsu will offer Incense
* The one who kneels 3 times will bring element Water.

[G]uard.desc: There is a guard near the tunnel
[G]uard.action_acl_msg:
Access to the tunnel can only be granted to a group
of 4 people, each bringing one of the 4 elements.
[G]uard.action_msg:
Make sure your offering is perfect, otherwise the High Priest will
not trust you and rejects access to the secret Pyramid.

Here are your personal hints:

* Khonsu will kneel more than once.
* The one who offers Incense will bring element Fire.

[G]uard.desc: There is a guard near the tunnel
[G]uard.action_acl_msg:
Access to the tunnel can only be granted to a group
of 4 people, each bringing one of the 4 elements.
[G]uard.action_msg:
Make sure your offering is perfect, otherwise the High Priest will
not trust you and rejects access to the secret Pyramid.

Here are your personal hints:

* Bes will bring element Air
* Anubis will be kneeling once more than the one bringing element Earth

[G]uard.desc: There is a guard near the tunnel
[G]uard.action_acl_msg:
Access to the tunnel can only be granted to a group
of 4 people, each bringing one of the 4 elements.
[G]uard.action_msg:
Make sure your offering is perfect, otherwise the High Priest will
not trust you and rejects access to the secret Pyramid.

Here are your personal hints:

* Anubis will bring a Robe as offering, he will not kneel 2 times.
* The one bringing the element Air will offer something other than Fruit

[T]unnel.desc: A dark and long tunnel that leads to the Pyramid
[T]unnel.open_acl_msg: The tunnel is closed, only the priest can tell the guard to let you in.

Papyrus [R]oll.desc:
Please follow these instructions carefully if you want
to enter the tunnel. The guard is very picky on who he lets
through. 

You can only enter the tunnel with 4 people at
the same time. Each person must choose the correct
offering (wine, fruit, robe or incense) and kneel the 
right amount of times (1, 2, 3 or 4 times).

Last, but certainly not least, you must all bring one of the
four elements of nature (earth, air, fire or water).

Good luck!

High [P]riest.desc: The high priest is standing at the altar where you have placed your offering.
High [P]riest.action_str1:
In order to allow you access to the secret Pyramid, you need
to work together. Please give me the sum of all of your
personal access-codes.
High [P]riest.action_msg:
It is good to see a group work so well together, I have ordered
the guard to open the tunnel for you!
High [P]riest.state_desc: The priest allows access to the tunnel

[A]ltar.desc: The offering altar is where you can place your offerings to the high priest.
[A]ltar.state_desc: The offer made the High Priest visible
